title: I need your opinions about my new typefaces.
content:
Hello friends:

I have attached a PDF file contains my new designed typefaces. I do need your esteemed critiques regarding them and any technical comments.

Thank you for all your help and support.
author: Eyadnalsamman

comments.content:
Sorry friends, the file can be downloaded from the following address:  
 [OHamburgefonstiv\_English](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416055740/http:/typophile.com/files/OHamburgefonstiv_English.pdf)
The series is in the look-a-likes category and sure you are proud of your effort as you should be.

They are all okay decorative fonts, although they may not suite the needs of most graphic designers today unfortunately.

However they are fun, and could be used for some quirkier things, perhaps posters, t-shirts, and cd covers.
